data.name: Groove Fit Island!!
data.detailed_description:
Get into the rhythm and enjoy fitness!
This is ""Groove Fit Island"", where animals love music and exercise.
When you visit the island, you'll be challenged one after another to ""Groove Fit,"" the traditional sport of the island!

■A variety of unique ""Groove Fits"".

In addition to groove fits based on familiar sports such as tennis, boxing, and baseball, there are also unique groove fits such as pizza delivery, fishing, and kendama.

■Calories burned are calculated based on the METs index, so you can stay healthy while having fun!

Each groove fit has its own METs index. Each groove fit has its own METs index, so you can feel how many calories you're burning while having fun!

■The possibilities are endless with ""Endless Mode""!

Each groove fit has its own METs index, so you can see how many calories you burn while having fun! How far can you go...?

■Compete with players from around the world in online rankings!

Compete with players from all over the world for scores and calories burned for each groove fit. Aim to be a high ranker!

■VRoidHub linkage support! Play Groove Fits with your favorite avatar!

You can play all Groove Fit games with your own avatar or a character you "liked" on VRoidHub. You can set up an "Audience" monitor to show you playing from a third-person perspective.
*"VRoid Hub" is a service of Pixiv Inc.

～ This game is recommended for people like you! ～

・Those who want to play quickly and easily.
・For those who love music games.
・Those who want to meet unique animal characters
・People who feel they don't get enough exercise in their daily lives.
・Those who want to do some light exercise
・People who want to get a light workout.

～Let's explore the island together in ""GrooveFitClub""! ～

GrooveFit Island is still developing, so join the Discord server and be part of the team that makes the island better!

data.short_description: Rhythm x Fitness x VR! Let's get fit while having fun to the music with the unique animals!
data.supported_languages: English, Japanese, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Korean

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 or Higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
